title: Emerald & Diamond Grandeur: A Contemporary Haaram
materials: Crafted in 18K Yellow Gold and embellished with meticulously placed round brilliant-cut Diamonds. Features exquisite Emeralds
showcasing vivid green hues and showcasing a cabochon cut. Polished to a radiant shine for a luxurious finish.
features: This Haaram showcases a delicate filigree design centered with striking green emeralds. The geometric shapes studded with diamonds are accented with emerald beads. The diamond setting is done meticulously for optimal brilliance.
colors: accentuated by the dazzling white of the diamonds. The contrast creates a vibrant and sophisticated aesthetic
occasions: Ideal for special occasions such as weddings (Vivaha Mahotsavam)
or any grand celebration. This piece will add a touch of traditional elegance and modern sophistication to any outfit.
description: This Haaram is a testament to exceptional craftsmanship, blending traditional South Indian aesthetics with modern design sensibilities. The brilliance of the diamonds combined with the rich green emeralds creates a unique and captivating piece that is sure to be treasured for generations. This necklace is a timeless masterpiece.
